definition: Nanyue district of Hengyang city 衡陽市|衡阳市[Heng2 yang2 shi4], Hunan/Mt Heng 衡山 in Hunan, one of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳[Wu3 yue4]

Nanyue district of Hengyang city 衡陽市|衡阳市[Heng2 yang2 shi4], Hunan

sentences.english: Hence, it nourishes the best 420 mu tea garden in Nanyue.
sentences.chinese: 因此，这里也润泽着南岳最好的420亩茶园。

sentences.english: This girl goes to Beijing from the driftage after this world of Hunan high mountain runs away from home.
sentences.chinese: 这名女子是从中国湖南岳阳离家外岀后沦落到首都的。

sentences.english: How long does flexible express delivery need from Jiangsu Huai An to Hunan Yue Yang City?
sentences.chinese: 圆通快递从江苏淮安到湖南岳阳要多久？

sentences.english: You can go to the Nanyue Temple.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去游览南岳寺庙。

sentences.english: According to the historical record, there were already Gongcha (tea as tribute) gardens in Nanyue in the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 史书上记载，南岳在唐代便有贡茶园。

sentences.english: The winter in Nanyue is colder while the subtropical high is stronger, and vice versa.
sentences.chinese: 西太平洋副热带高压与南岳冬季气温密切相关。
